about.description:
# STARTER ACCESS
Enjoy a fun racing experience for free with regularly updated content and collectable rewards.

# NO AI, REAL PLAYERS' GHOSTS
Even solo, race against other playersâ€™ ghosts that are close to your level to help you improve progressively, at your own pace.

# REGULARLY UPDATED CONTENT
25 official tracks, updated every 3 months and playable solo, online and locally to practice your racing skills.

# PROGRESSION
You can either play by yourself and enjoy the drive, or collect medals and assess your skills with regional and international rankings.
about.shortDescription: Trackmania, the racing franchise from Ubisoft Nadeo, is back with the most compelling remake of Trackmania Nations.
about.title: Trackmania

reqs.title: GPU
reqs.minimum: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R9 270X
reqs.recommended: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480

reqs.title: Sound
reqs.minimum: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
reqs.recommended: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers

reqs.title: Peripherals
reqs.minimum: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse required, XInput based controller (Xbox 360 / Xbox One / PS4)
reqs.recommended: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse required, XInput based controller (Xbox 360 / Xbox One / PS4)
